h2: Ready to discoverwhat BrinqAI can do?
p: We may collect the following types of information:
Messages or inquiries submitted through forms
This data is collected using cookies, analytics tools, and similar technologies.
Respond to inquiries and demo requests
Communicate with you about our products and services
Improve website performance and user experience
Analyze usage trends and site effectiveness
We use cookies and third-party analytics services (such as Google Analytics or similar tools) to understand how visitors use our website.
You can control or disable cookies through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may impact certain site functionality.
We do not sell or rent personal information.
Trusted service providers who assist in operating the website
Legal or regulatory authorities if required by law
Business successors in the event of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale
All third parties are required to protect your data.
We implement reasonable technical and organizational safeguards to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
We retain personal data only as long as necessary for legitimate business purposes or to comply with legal obligations.
Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
To exercise these rights, contact us at:
Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices.
We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be reflected on this page with a revised date.
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at:

/.title: BrinqAI | AI-Powered Industrial Vision & Operational Intelligence
/.description: BrinqAI helps industrial teams prevent downtime, improve safety, and optimize operations with AI-powered computer vision and real-time insights.
h2: AI-Powered Vision for Safer, Smarter Operations
Built For the Realities of Industrial Operations
Find out how we deliver mission critical insights to global industry leaders
Ready to discoverwhat BrinqAI can do?
h3: Evaluate Real-time Insights and Model Adaptability
h4: Centralized Fleet Management with OTA Updates
p: Real-time, edge AI that improves safety, efficiency and visibility across your facility.

Minor incidents, jams and bottlenecks result in major downstream production or safety risks. Manual monitoring can’t keep up — and traditional systems don’t understand context.BrinqAI sees issues forming in real time, so your team has the information they need before downtime happens.

BrinqAI transforms camera systems into intelligent sensors that detect risks, inefficiencies, and anomalies as they happen.  Built for industrial environments, deployed at the edge and optimized for accuracy and speed.
Works with existing equipment or specialized vision cameras
Monitor PPE compliance, detect hazards, define safe operating zones.
Detect jams, delays, or slowdowns early
Secure data using real-time local edge processing.
Leverage APIs to connect existing equipment and infrastructure.
Deploy, manage and update at scale.
AcuSight is BrinqAI's platform for production scale environments.  It delivers real-time analysis, automated alerts and structured insights — so teams can act faster and prevent downtime.
AcuSight empowers teams to adapt, scale and optimize systems with comprehensive fleet management capabilities, built-in AI tooling and seamless integrations.
Identify unsafe behaviors, missing PPE and access violations.
Detect jams, blockages or stalled processes before they escalate.
Monitor production lines for contaminants, defects or anomalies.
Map key risk points, operational dependencies, and monitoring requirements.
Access dashboards, alerts, build and deploy models.
Connect existing or approved partner hardware and use APIs for system integration.
Let us show you how to improve your operations.
